attributes.action: return the right of the people of the United Kingdom to elect a member of parliament not governed by the undemocratic party policies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Electing a party member of parliament is contrary to democracy.   MP's should represent the views and desires of their constituents and not those of the party to which they belong.   Such policies are devised by politicians for politicians and the electorate have no democratic influence upon them.   Make it law that MP's can only represent the views of their own constituents and let the government choose which of those views are worthy of political debate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
